1.1.2 (February 2, 2024)
 - Updated @splitsoftware/browser-rum-agent package to version 0.4.1.

1.1.1 (January 18, 2024)
 - Added UMD bundle versions of the library in the Split CDN to import via HTML script tags: "https://cdn.split.io/sdk/browser-suite-1.1.1.min.js" and "https://cdn.split.io/sdk/browser-suite-1.1.1.js".
 - Updated @splitsoftware/splitio-browserjs package to version 0.13.1 and some transitive dependencies for vulnerability fixes.

1.1.0 (December 22, 2023)
 - Added a new `rumAgent` method to the Suite instance, which returns the Browser RUM Agent.
 - Updated @splitsoftware/splitio-browserjs package to version 0.13.0, which includes support for flag sets and other improvements.
 - Updated @splitsoftware/browser-rum-agent package to version 0.4.0, which `track` and `trackError` methods now return a boolean indicating if the event was queued or not.
 - Updated internal implementation to support localhost mode.

1.0.0 (October 31, 2023)
 - Initial public release with @splitsoftware/splitio-browserjs version 0.11.0 and @splitsoftware/browser-rum-agent version 0.3.2. Check the official documentation for details: https://help.split.io/hc/en-us/articles/22622277712781-Browser-suite.
